subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Officiating (Sports)
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Sepp Blatter, the president of FIFA, cannot fix the officiating problems in this World Cup, but he is at last considering the use of technology to aid the referees in the future.
snippet: Sepp Blatter, the president of FIFA, cannot fix the officiating problems in this World Cup, but he is at last considering the use of technology to aid the referees in the future.
